description: Episode of Series "World Is Ours". International cooperation in weather forecasting. Radio communications system controlled by the World Meteorological Organisation of the United Nations. Numerous examples of how weather forecasting can reduce or eliminate the danger and damage of hurricanes, gales and high tides. Weather studies in the reclamation of desert areas.
